bio: And so / being young and full of folly / I fell in love with melancholy
author: Jacob Garbe

whileWalkingToStoreISaw: When I was going to #theStore# I saw
deathSign1: it lay in a puddle of its own viscera
it had left a short trail of blood
its mouth was stretched in a rictus
its innards were smeared to the pavement
it was bloated almost out of recognition
wind and rain had weathered it to bone
deathSign2: flies had laid their eggs in it
sun had turned its skin to parchment
processParts: I added the #animal# #animalBodyPart# to #processor#. The #animal# #animalBodyPart# from last week is #almost# #finished#. #modExcellent.capitalize#.
addToShrine1: I walked to the #shrine# I was building #shrineLoc#. Added #animal.a#'s #animalBodyPart# I'd #found# recently to it. #beautiful.capitalize#.
addToShrine2: Added #animal.a#'s #animalBodyPart# I'd recently #found# to the #shrine# I'm #building# #shrineLoc#. #beautiful.capitalize#.
addToShrine3: Walked to the #shrine# #shrineLoc# today. Added #animal.a#'s #animalBodyPart# I'd #found# recently to it. #beautiful.capitalize#.
weirdThing: one of the #animal# skulls just winked at me. How does a skull even wink
I heard...whispers. Like talking, but like #animal.a# #talking#
I heard them #talking#. They...told me things.
dream1: #setMode##dreamtLastNight.capitalize# I was #movementMode#. Carried by #animal# skeletons. They had #movementPart#, obviously. Said they were taking me to #dest#. #whatItMean.capitalize#?
dream2: #setMode##dreamtLastNight.capitalize# I was #movementMode# to #dest#. Carried by #animal# skeletons with...#movementPart#. #whatItMean.capitalize#?
waterDest: 'where the dark weighs more than light'
askWhatImDoing: #classMate# saw me #atShrineLoc# arranging the #animal# #animalBodyPart.s# on my #shrine#. #confront#
confront: Asked me what I was doing. #ugh#. #howCouldIExplain.capitalize#.
howCouldIExplain: how could I even begin to explain
I can't expect anyone to understand
I could never bridge the vast gap between us
longUgh: I can't wait to leave this town
can't wait to get out of here
this is what I suffer through
likeYouCare: I should have been an orphan
quoteLyrics:
How did it go so fast
You'll say as we are looking back
And then we'll understand
We held gold dust in our hands
In our hands

And blown speakers
Fireworks

I'm not here
This isn't happening

quotePoem: "My head is a hive of words that won't settle."
"The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins"
"I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity."
"From childhood's hour I have not been. As others were, I have not seen. As others saw, I could not awaken. My heart to joy at the same tone. And all I loved, I loved alone."
"Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality."
